DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect various degree renal function pharmacokinetics safety ALKS 5461 .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Safety ALKS 5461 Subjects With Renal Impairment Normal Renal Function
DOC.criteria: For subject : Has body mass index ( BMI ) 18.040.0 kg/m^2 total body weight > 50kg Agrees use approve method contraception duration study Additional criterion may apply For subject renal impairment : Has severe end stage renal disease , require dialysis Has stable renal function least 60 day precede screen Additional criterion may apply For subject : Has past history current finding clinically significant observed abnormality , psychiatric medical condition renal impairment Has history gastrointestinal surgery affect drug absorption biliary elimination , exclude appendectomy cholecystectomy Is pregnant , plan become pregnant , lactate Has history clinically significant allergy hypersensitivity opioids Additional criterion apply For subject renal impairment : Has evidence compromise respiratory function , seizure disorder , myasthenia gravis Has receive kidney transplant Additional criterion may apply
